```py
def SetNodeResource(x, y, z, r, v):
    n = get_node(x,y)
    n.z = z
    n.resources.add(r, v)
```

```py
 def __private_method(self, arg, *args, **kwargs):
        print('%s.__private_method called:' % self.__class__.__name__)
        print('+- arg ...... %s' % arg)
        print('+- args ..... %s' % str(args))
        print('+- kwargs ... %s' % kwargs)
```
